704710f-a.title: Brooklyn: Greenpoint Avenue - Provost Street
704710f-a.text:
Greenpoint Avenue, at the N.E. corner of Provost Street, showing a factory manufacturing hats and seeling direct to the public doing away with both the jobber and the retailers profit.
July 25, 1939
P. L. Sperr
704710f-a.folder: Greenpoint Avenue & Provost Street, Brooklyn, NY
